content:
# The movement to the coal position (22.5, -14.5) was successful. This indicates that my player position is now correctly updating.

# Now, I will attempt to place the stone furnace at this position once again. 
# This time, I will ensure that I am close enough to place the furnace without exceeding the distance constraints.

furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5))  # Place the furnace at the coal position
print(f'Placed furnace at position: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm the placement of the furnace
